backend/main.mo: Empty Motoko actor with no methods.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report stub containing no features.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Prewritten summaries of key frontend files including App, evasive button hook, global styles, and HTML entry point.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind base/theme configuration defining color variables and dark mode settings.
frontend/index.html: HTML root document loading the React app via main.tsx.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Main React component showing a Valentine prompt with an evasive No button and a celebratory Yes screen.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: React hook that creates and manages an authenticated or anonymous backend actor using react-query.
frontend/src/hooks/useEvasiveButton.ts: Hook that repositions a button to random safe locations in response to mouse, pointer, or touch events.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Internet Identity provider and hook handling identity loading, login, logout, and status management.
frontend/src/index.css: Extended Tailwind config with romantic theme colors and utility classes for the frontend.
frontend/src/main.tsx: React entrypoint bootstrapping the app with QueryClient and InternetIdentityProvider.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind CSS configuration enabling dark mode, custom color variables, animations, and plugins for typography, container queries, and animations.
project_state.json: Project state descriptor detailing feature requirements for a romantic Valentine web page with interactive Yes/No behavior and a celebratory meme on Yes.
